H0.text: Which chemical compound is the active ingredient in agricultural lime. MgO

H1.text: Which chemical compound is the active ingredient in agricultural lime. MgCO3

H2.text: Which chemical compound is the active ingredient in agricultural lime. CaSO4

H3.text: Which chemical compound is the active ingredient in agricultural lime. Caco3

A4.text: The primary active component is calcium carbonate.
